definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: The riot police started to crack down on them.
sentences.chinese: 防暴警察開始對他們採取鎮壓行動。

sentences.english: In the future, police patrols could be equipped with anti-riot guns.
sentences.chinese: 警方用化學噴劑和防暴槍驅散示威人羣。

sentences.english: Riot police hurled tear gas canisters and smoke bombs into the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 防暴警察向人羣中投擲了催淚瓦斯罐和煙幕彈。

sentences.english: Officers use chemical sprays and stun guns to restrain demonstrators.
sentences.chinese: 警方用化學噴劑和防暴槍驅散示威人羣。

sentences.english: On our way we have seen anti-riot police taking positions in major intersections.
sentences.chinese: 在路上我們看到有很多防暴警察。

sentences.english: Several youth threw stones at police before riot police moved in to break up the protests.
sentences.chinese: 數名年輕人朝趕來驅散示威者的防暴警察投擲了石塊。

sentences.english: Some threw stones at riot police.
sentences.chinese: 有人向防暴警察投擲石塊。

sentences.english: They were met by black-clad police with helmets, face masks and small round riot shields.
sentences.chinese: 防暴警察，全副武裝，青衣面甲，手執圓盾。

sentences.english: Dozens of police, including riot police, were deployed ahead of the rally.
sentences.chinese: 大量的警察包括防暴警察在示威人羣前面排開。

sentences.english: To put down the strike, the bosses hae sent out a troop of riotous pickets .
sentences.chinese: 爲了鎮壓罷工，老闆們派出一隊防暴糾察。

sentences.english: Their scuffle was stopped by the riot police.
sentences.chinese: 他們的毆鬥被防暴警察制止了。

sentences.english: Riot police run after students during an anti-government rally in Valparaiso, on August 9, 2011. (Reuters/Eliseo Fernandez)
sentences.chinese: 瓦爾帕萊索，反政府集會中，防暴警察追趕學生。

sentences.english: Riot police eventually broke up the demonstrations with water cannons and tear gas.
sentences.chinese: 防暴警察用水炮和催淚瓦斯驅散了示威活動。

sentences.english: Police in riot gear dispersed the crowd but made no arrests.
sentences.chinese: 防暴警察驅散了人羣但沒有逮捕鬧事球迷。

sentences.english: However, the Eastern Bloc had its own line-up of riot police vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 然而，東方陣營也有自己生產的警用防暴車輛。

sentences.english: Some anti-riot trucks were repainted red and were used as fire engines. Here is the Magirus-Mercur model from 1962
sentences.chinese: 有些防暴卡車被重新噴塗成爲紅色並被用作消防車。

definition: SWAT (Special Weapons And Tactics)/riot police/abbr. for 特種警察|特种警察[te4 zhong3 jing3 cha2]
special duty (e.g. extra security or traffic control on special occasions)/person on special duty
individual soldier/(literary) isolated military unit, cut off from reinforcements
